effects.1: Impaled from mouth to rectum, you die agonizingly unable to scream or defecate. Your corpse is hard to look at it.
effects.2: A terrible wound penetrates the soft tissue of your upper palate and you die choking on your own leaking brain fluid. Awful.
effects.3: Blood leaking everywhere around your hips reveals the terrible wound in your groin.
effects.4: Air wheezes from the hole in your chest as your lungs deflate for the last time.
effects.5: A ghastly puncture that left your guts spilling out messily betrays your grisly end.
effects.6: A deep stab wound reveals your harsh demise.

effects.1: A terrible wound penetrated the soft tissue of your upper palate and you died choking on your own leaking brain fluid. Awful.
effects.2: Blood leaking everywhere around your hips reveals the terrible wound in your groin.
effects.3: Air wheezes from the hole in your chest as your lungs deflate for the last time.
effects.4: A ghastly puncture that left your guts spilling out messily betrays your grisly end.
effects.5: A deep stab wound reveals your harsh demise.
effects.6: Your corpse is largely and intact and ready for a noble funeral.

condition_recovery: You are mortally wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 round. If you are healed, you need 1 month of bed rest.

effects.1: Your spinal cord is severed at the neck (DEX reduced to 3, cannot move, fight, use items, or cast spells, must make Death save each month or die from complications).
effects.2: Your spinal cord is severed at the waist (as per legs crushed, cannot reproduce, and must make Death save each year or die from complications).
effects.3: A puncture near the heart leaves you an invalid (CON reduced by 1/3, movement rate reduced by 30’, must make Death save each year or die from complications).
effects.4: A puncture in the abdominal cavity leaves you infection-prone and weak (CON reduced by 1/3, -4 to saving throws vs. diseases and poisons)
effects.5: A strike thru the eye into the brain leaves you blind (blinded, -4 attack throws, no LOS, move reduced to ¼ normal, -2 to surprise rolls)
effects.6: A puncture wound to the throat leaves you mute and breathing through a hole (mute, cannot speak, cast spells, or use magic items involving speech, -4 to reactions).

condition_recovery: You are grievously wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 turn. If you are healed, you need 2 weeks of bed rest.

effects.1: A projectile/weapon that pierced your skull has left you permanently addled (-2 on magical research and proficiency throws, -10% penalty on earned XP).
effects.2: A punctured lung leaves you forever breathless (must rest for 2 turns every 6, wilderness move reduced by 1/3, cannot force march, CON reduced by 1/3).
effects.3: One leg is lamed by broken bone and destroyed muscle (movement reduced by 30’, DEX reduced by 1/3 for AC purposes)
effects.4: One arm is lamed by broke bone and destroyed muscle (cannot climb, dual wield, use shield or two-handed weapon).
effects.5: One of your eyes is punctured and ruined (-2 to missile attack throws).
effects.6: A puncture wound to the throat leaves several vocal cords severed (raspy voice, -2 to throws involving speech)

condition_recovery: You are critically wounded. You die unless healed to 1 hp within 1 day. If you are healed, you need 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: The shard of a weapon inside your skull leaves you impulsive and angry (shift alignment one step towards Chaotic, suffer 1 in 6 chance each round of combat of going berserk, as proficiency).
effects.2: The deep wound has destroyed your manhood/ womanhood. (cannot reproduce, -3 to reaction rolls if loss of manhood / womanhood is known).
effects.3: The shard of a weapon lodged irretrievably in your innards leaves you in constant pain (-2 to all initiative rolls)
effects.4: A puncture ruins one hand (cannot dual-wield or use two-handed weapons).
effects.5: One of your eyes is damaged (-2 to missile attacks throws at medium and long range).
effects.6: A puckered scar shows you’ve suffered a puncture wound (minor scarring).

condition_recovery: You are in shock. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing and one night of bed rest, or 1 week of bed rest.

effects.1: A hideous puncture scar is worsened by the deformation of spongy facial bone under the shock of a penetration. (gruesome scarring)
effects.2: A pair of ribs are shattered by the forceful puncture (cannot force march).
effects.3: Your ear is torn clean off (-1 to Listening throws and -1 to surprise rolls).
effects.4: A deflected strike left a long streak of scar tissue along your jawline (noticeable scarring).
effects.5: A puckered scar shows you’ve suffered a puncture wound. (minor scarring).
effects.6: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were knocked out. You recover with 1 hp. You need magical healing or one night of bedrest.

effects.1: You are left with a deep wound that perpetually aches (-1 to all initiative rolls).
effects.2: A puncture to your pectoral muscles leaves you slightly numb and weak (carrying capacity reduced by 3 stone).
effects.3: A penetrating blow left a gaping hole through your upper ear (noticeable scarring).
effects.4: A puckered scar shows you’ve suffered a puncture wound. (minor scarring).
effects.5: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.6: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.

condition_recovery: You were just dazed. You recover immediately with 1hp. You do not need any bed rest.

effects.1: The puncture heals poorly and aches in bad weather (-1 to initiative in Frigid, Drizzly, or Rainy weather).
effects.2: A puncture wound on your cheek heals into a large and ragged round scar (noticeable scarring).
effects.3: A puckered scar shows you’ve suffered a puncture wound. (minor scarring).
effects.4: Ghostly visions of lost companions flicker before your eyes as you awaken.
effects.5: A vision of the afterlife haunts you, then fades as you awaken.
effects.6: The Choosers of the Slain pass you by, and you awaken.
